name: derby-entities-lib
description: Base library for derby-entity CRUD component and derby-entities-visualizations

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean; touch .create_stash && git stash save --include-untracked "npm build stash";
scripts.build: export DEST=dist;export ASSETS='.*.css|.*.html|./README.md|./package.json';find -path './node_modules*' -prune -o -name '*.ls' -print0| xargs -n1 -0 sh -c 'echo Compiling and minifying $0...;DEST_PATH="$DEST/`dirname $0`";mkdir -p "$DEST_PATH";lsc -cp "$0" | uglifyjs - -cm -o "$DEST_PATH/`basename -s .ls "$0"`".js;';echo "[01;32mCopying assets...[00m";find \( -path './node_modules*' -o -path "./$DEST/*" \) -prune -o -regextype posix-egrep -regex $ASSETS -print0| xargs -n1 -0 sh -c 'mkdir -p "$DEST/`dirname "$0"`";cp -a "$0" "$DEST/$0"';echo "[01;32mDone![00m";
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean; npm run build;
